original_text: ‘Son of man, make a mark on two roads for the king of Babylon to follow with his army. Both these roads must start from the same country. Put a sign at the place where the two roads go in separate directions. ‘Son of man, make a mark on two roads for the king of Babylon to follow with his army. Both these roads must start from the same country. Put a sign at the place where the two roads go in separate directions.
korean_text: 인자야 너는 바벨론 왕의 칼이 올 두 길을 한 땅에서 나오도록 그리되 곧 성으로 들어가는 길 어귀에다가 길이 나뉘는 지시표를 하여

sentences.original_text: make a mark on two roads
for the king of Babylon to follow with his army
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌론 왕이 그의 군대와 함께 따라가도록

sentences.original_text: Both these roads must start from the same country
sentences.korean_translation: 이 두 길은 모두 같은 나라에서 시작해야 한다

sentences.original_text: Put a sign at the place
where the two roads go in separate directions
